channel.title: Software Outsourcing, Outsourcing china, Offshore Development, Offshore Software Development Center, Offshore Outsourcing in Shanghai China - Bleum
channel.description: Bleum is one of China's leading IT and software outsourcing providers in a variety of sectors including high-tech, financial services, telecommunications, and retail. We create global development centers and provide services such as application development, support and maintenance, testing, and legacy system modernization.

item.title: Bleum Named Outsourcing Rising Star by IAOP
item.description: Shanghai, China, May 16, 2011 - Bleum Inc., a China-based IT outsourcing company that builds core systems and software products for U.S. and European companies, has been named one of the top 10 Rising Stars in global outsourcing by the International Association of Outsourcing Professionals. Identified earlier this year by IAOP as one of the top 100 global outsourcers for its sixth consecutive year, Bleum is the only China-based firm to be singled out for the additional Rising Star recognition.

item.title: Bleum Named Top 100 Global Outsourcer for Sixth Year
item.description: Shanghai, China, February 23, 2011 - Bleum Inc., a China-based IT outsourcing company that works with U.S. and European companies, has been named to the 2011 Global Outsourcing 100 for the sixth consecutive year. This annual list of the world's best outsourcing providers, compiled by the International Association of Outsourcing Professionals, is based on evaluations by an independent panel of outsourcing buyers that assesses: company size and growth; customer references; organizational competencies; and management capabilities.

item.title: Bleum won the Best Value for Money/ROI award from CrossTech Forums
item.description: CANTON, Mass., February 22, 2011 -- CrossTech Forums, LLC (www.crosstechforums.com) a leader in the hosted executive conference market today announced the winners of the 2011 Financial Technology Insight Summit Customer Choice Awards (www.FinancialTechnologyInsight.com). The nominations for these awards are made by the participating technology buyers and senior staff end users, primarily director-level and above in management positions at top commercial, retail and community banks - the ultimate in Customer Choice Awards. The Financial Technology Insight conference program agenda is developed in conjunction with Bank Technology News and CIO Insights editors.

item.title: Bleum Selected as a 2010 Red Herring Asia Top 100 Tech Startup
item.description: San Mateo, CA - Red Herring announced its Top 100 Asia Award in recognition of the leading private companies from Asia, celebrating these startups’ innovations and technologies across their respective industries.

item.title: Kenya Man Rises from Poverty to Opportunity through Leadership Development Program
item.description: Colorado Springs, Colo., December 9, 2010 — A young graduate of Compassion International’s Leadership Development Program (LDP) left his small village in Kenya this week to start a life-changing job opportunity…in Shanghai. China-based IT outsourcer Bleum Inc., a Compassion IT vendor, created a software testing position in an effort to provide an extraordinary opportunity, partnering with Compassion to complete the cycle of releasing one young man from poverty.

item.title: Bleum Wins Prestigious 2010 Red Herring Asia 100 Award
item.description: Also named one of fastest-growing companies in Asia by Deloitte

item.title: Bleum Reappraised as CMMI Level 5, Highest Possible Process Maturity for Software Development
item.description: Shanghai, China, August 9, 2010—Reaffirming its industry-leading software development practices, China-based IT outsourcer Bleum Inc. has received the Software Engineering Institute’s Capability Maturity Model Integration (CMMI) Level 5 rating. Essentially a combination of total quality management and lean principles for software development, the CMMI model helps companies improve their quality and achieve higher productivity for software development.

item.title: Bleum Recruits New Finance Leader
item.description: Shanghai, China, July 12, 2010—Bleum Inc., a China-based IT outsourcer that helps clients improve their business performance, has recruited Linda Zhu as its vice president of finance and administration. Like the rest of Bleum’s management team, Zhu brings strong leadership experience at top global firms, including Johnson & Johnson and PricewaterhouseCoopers.

item.title: Bleum To Develop Fabrication Machinery Software for Amada America
item.description: Shanghai, China, July 9, 2010—Amada America Inc., a leader in sheet metal fabrication equipment and software, has selected Bleum to build, maintain, test and support its CAD/CAM software used for operating its best-selling line of sheet metal manufacturing machinery. As part of the three-year contract, Bleum will establish a dedicated global delivery center and team at its Shanghai headquarters to support Amada.

item.title: Bleum Recruits New HR Director
item.description: Shanghai, China, June 22, 2010—Bleum Inc., a fast-growing Shanghai-based IT outsourcer, has hired Pearly Tan as its new director of human resources. Tan, who joined Bleum on June 14, oversees Bleum’s recruiting and employee development efforts, which have played a critical role in the company’s success.

item.title: Bleum UK Launch June 8th and June 10th:Entry to the world of Chinese offshoring just got a lot easier
item.description: Bleum Inc. is proud to announce the launch of its UK offices. It will be hosting two events in celebration of this exciting news.

item.title: Bleum UK Launch June 10th:Entry to the world of Chinese offshoring just got a lot easier
item.description: Bleum Inc. is proud to announce the launch of its UK offices. It will be hosting an event in celebration of this exciting news.

item.title: iPhone App Makes Navigating Shanghai Easy for Executives At World Expo Bleum Shanghai Guide App Free at iTunes.com
item.description: Shanghai, China May 7, 2010 – Need a five-star hotel in Shanghai or to give directions to a taxi driver who only speaks Mandarin? Bleum's new Shanghai Guide mobile application for iPhone makes it easy for both business executives and tourists to navigate China's largest city.

item.title: Former JP Morgan Chase Credit Card CIO Joins Bleum As U.S. General Manager
item.description: Shanghai, China, April 29, 2010—Bleum Inc., a China-based IT outsourcer to U.S. and European companies, has recruited James Venglarik as its first U.S. general manager. Venglarik, who has served in senior IT and operating posts at companies including JP Morgan Chase, Expedia, and AT&T Universal Card, will oversee Bleum’s work with U.S. clients.1by Gartner, Inc.

item.title: IT Outsourcer Bleum Inc. Named "Cool Vendor" By Leading Analyst Firm
item.description: Shanghai, China, April 22, 2010—Bleum Inc., a China-based IT outsourcer to U.S. and European companies in technology, financial services, telecommunications, manufacturing and retail, is one of just four companies named "Cool Vendors in Application Services, 2010"1by Gartner, Inc.

item.title: In a Cross-Cultural Twist, China-based IT Firm Recruits U.S. College Grads
item.description: Shanghai, China, March 17, 2010—After years of American technology firms hiring Asian nationals to work in the United States, a China-based IT services firm is reversing the tide by recruiting U.S. computer engineers to work in Shanghai.

item.title: Bleum Named To Global Outsourcing 100 List for Fifth Year
item.description: Shanghai, China, February 25, 2010 - Bleum Inc., an IT outsourcing company based in China that works exclusively with U.S. and European companies, has been named to The Global Outsourcing 100® for the fifth consecutive year. This list of the leading global outsourcing providers, compiled by the International Association of Outsourcing Professionals, is based on evaluations by an independent panel of judges that assesses four critical characteristics: size and growth; customer references; organizational competencies; and management capabilities.

item.title: Bleum Announces the Appointment of William Stancer as VP Business DevelopmentWilliam will Help Accelerate Bleum's Expansion and Set up the High Performance Team
item.description: Shanghai, China December 10, 2009 – Bleum Inc. today announced that it has expanded its senior management team with the appointment of William Stancer as VP Business Development. William, one of the industry's most experienced marketers spent thirteen years at Accenture where he was Senior Executive, responsible for Accenture's Global Marketing and Business Development activities for their Resources Industries (Energy, Utility and Chemical industries).

item.title: Bleum Published Whitepaper on Outsourcing to ChinaRemoving the Risk & Maximizing Competitive Advantage
item.description: Shanghai, China December 9, 2009 – Bleum, one of China's top IT outsourcing providers to American and European companies, commissioned its whitepaper upon "Outsourcing to China – Removing the Risks & Maximize Competitive Advantage" from Frost and Sullivan, a leading consulting firm with operations around the world.

item.title: Bleum Awarded Deloitte Technology Fast 50 China 2009
item.description: Shanghai, China November 27, 2009 - Bleum Inc. one of the leading outsourcing companies in China announced today that the Company has been ranked by Deloitte as one of the Technology Fast 50 China 2009 with a growth rate of 165% in 2008. This is a prestigious award which recognizes excellence and fast growth in high-tech companies in the fields of technology, media, and telecommunications.

item.title: Bleum Sponsoring Global Sourcing Forum and Expo
item.description: Shanghai, China, October 27, 2009 - Shanghai, China - Bleum Inc. one of the leading outsourcing companies in China will sponsor the Global Sourcing Forum + Expo (GSFE), the premier industry event focusing on sourcing from November 11 to 12 at the Javits Convention Center in New York City.

item.title: Bleum Published Whitepaper Addressing IP Infringement Protection in China
item.description: Shanghai, China October 14, 2009 - Bleum, one of China's leading IT outsourcing providers to American and European companies today, published its latest whitepaper entitled "Outsource IP? Preventing IP Infringement in China" focused on the current status of IP issues in China.

item.title: Bleum Recognized As Software Star Company in Shanghai
item.description: Shanghai, China, September 29, 2009 - Bleum, one of China's leading IT outsourcing providers to American and European companies, has been recognized by Shanghai Software Industry Association (SSIA) as one of the Top 10 Software Export Companies in Shanghai, and Top 10 Fastest-Growing Software Companies in Shanghai as well. Additionally, Eric Rongley, the CEO of the company, has also been named as one of the Top 10 Outstanding Entrepreneurs in Shanghai Software Industry.

item.title: Bleum Named George McKinnon as Chief Delivery Officer George McKinnon Will Help Accelerate Bleum into a World Class Development Company
item.description: Shanghai, China, June 28, 2009 - Bleum, Inc., one of China's leading outsourcing providers to American and European companies, has appointed George McKinnon, a seasoned executive with over 20 years of technology management experience, as Chief Delivery Officer.

item.title: Bleum Names Patrick Rao as Quality Assurance Director
item.description: Shanghai, China, June 13, 2009 - Bleum, Inc., one of China's leading outsourcing providers to American and European companies, has named Patrick Rao, Quality Assurance Director, responsible for assuring high Quality of software services, delivery and operational excellence.

item.title: Bleum Recognized as a Top Outsourcing Provider in ChinaBleum Makes Devott's Top 50 Service Outsourcing Providers in China List
item.description: Tianjin, China March 25, 2009 – Bleum, one of China's leading IT outsourcing providers to American and European companies, has been recognized as one of China's leading outsourcing providers by Devott Co. LTD's Chinasourcing – Top 50 Service Outsourcing Providers in China 2008 list. Devott chose the Top 50 from a list of 4000 submissions on the basis of various criteria including outsourcing revenue, industry certifications and client references.

item.title: Bleum Recognized by IAOP as a Top Global Outsourcing Firm at the Outsourcing World Summit Bleum Acknowledged by Outsourcing Experts for 4th Year in Row
item.description: Carlsbad, California February 16, 2009 – Bleum, one of China's leading IT outsourcing providers to American and European companies, today announced that the International Association of Outsourcing Professionals (IAOP) has recognized it as one of the 100 leading global outsourcing firms. This is the 4th consecutive year that Bleum has been acknowledged for its leadership, global capabilities, growth and customer references.
